summary: Relating to the Seattle City Employees' Retirement System, amending SMC S 4.36.100 to require membership by newly hired employees in positions currently exempted; amending SMC S 4.36.190 to provide fr deposits and re-deposits contracts for "prior service" credit for officers and employees joining or rejoining the system; adding a new subsection 4.36.140G to expand the rulemaking authority of the Board of Administration and authorize delegation of authority to the Executive Director and amending Ordinance 78444, Sections 4, 12, and 7 respectively in connection therewith.
